name: Know more about Universe
short_description:
I'm very young (16 years old) but my mind says: <<I want to know more and more>>. Ghandi said: almost everything you do will be insignificant, but it is very important that you do. That's what I'm gonna try to do :D English is not my language, I speak Catalan, but have been sutudying English for years, so if I don't write some words bad, now you know why.
In fact, I'm not used to use this kind of web and I don't really know very well what is this project about;  but I think I'm going to investigate, firdt of all, our planer, the amazig Earth. Don't you thik it's beautiful?? I think this web is going to be very useful for me! :D
summary: Universe is the biggest Why plenty of others whys, let's investigate!
